short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Todo app with background image changer. It enhances your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus - Productivity Manager is an all-in-one productivity tool that helps you manage all your tasks with a feature-rich Todo List and bookmark manager. To keep you upbeat throughout the day, it also displays a motivational quote at the bottom that changes every time you refresh your browser or open a new tab. Additionally, the tool can be customised by changing its background image. It supports, Unsplash URLs and images in JPG, JPEG and PNG formats. It also fetches the weather data at real time along with temperature.

We will be updating this tool regularly with new and exciting features that'll help you stay focused and productive throughout the day!
